item.title: Projects
item.description: Podcastify AI #At LauzHack 2024, my team ideated and implemented “Podcastify AI”, a personalized podcast generation app for the Apple Watch that allows language learners to listen to podcasts on their proficiency level.

item.title: About
item.description: I like both the problem and the solution.
